speaker: Forbidden Vault
lines: You unlock the circular vault door and step inside.
Pedestals hold sealed items and labeled notes.
A sigiled coffer hums on a stand.
A glass ampoule holds bottled night.
A mirror sits turned to the wall.
You can study and leave as you found it.
Or you can take what is not offered.

choices.text: Study the coffer without opening it (good).
Open the coffer and pocket the ampoule (bad).

give_item.name: Night Ampoule
give_item.description: Uncork only if you mean it
